item.title: FunDictionary
item.description: FunDictionary is an application that helps you find words in English dictionaries, play Hangman, Pheasant or Wordle games and much more.

item.title: DexOffline
item.description: DexOffline is an application that helps you find words in DEX (the Romanian language dictionary) without being online, play Hangman, Pheasant or Wordle games and much more.

item.title: Privacy policy
item.description: Last Updated: Apr 13, 2022 This privacy policy describes how Octavian Hasna (“I”) and 3rd parties services (both “we”) collect, use and share personal information of consumer users of the website (“site”) and of the following apps (“products”): DexOffline for Windows DexOffline Plus for Windows DexOffline for Android DexOffline Plus for Android DexOffline for macOS/iOS DexOffline Plus for macOS/iOS FunDictionary for Android FunDictionary Plus for Android FunDictionary for macOS/iOS FunDictionary Plus for macOS/iOS What we collect We get information about you in a range of ways.

item.title: Research
item.description: My thesis goal is to extract patterns and knowledge from sensor data in order to drive improvements in the way customers use a given product. In this context, the fields of interest are: Time Series Analysis, code Recommendation Systems Sentiment Analysis I am part of the Knowledge Engineering Research Group. My current focus is on overcoming source signal dependence in time series analysis.
